question_text: A system is producing a pattern of one long and two short beeps. (Select all that apply)
answer_options: This indicates a video card failure on many BIOS versions
Documentation from the motherboard manufacturer should be consulted
The issue lies with the operating system bootloader
Replacing the CMOS battery will likely fix the issue
POST is providing diagnostic information through beep codes
correct_answer: This indicates a video card failure on many BIOS versions
Documentation from the motherboard manufacturer should be consulted
POST is providing diagnostic information through beep codes
explanation: Beep codes such as '1 long, 2 short' often point to video failures. These codes vary across BIOS vendors, so the official documentation should be used for decoding.
